row.entry: Value Set
Source of Payment Typology (PHDSC) - 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.3591
Code System
Source of Payment Typology (PHDSC) Code System - 2.16.840.1.113883.221.5
Version
Dynamic
Source URL
https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.3591
Definition

The development of a standard source of payment classification system is a high priority for public health and can be used for a wide variety of public health activities such as monitoring healthcare access and documenting disparities.
